content:
Certainly! Here are some additional recommendations for restaurants in Leyton that serve traditional British food:

1. The Coach and Horses - This pub and restaurant serves a variety of British dishes, including fish and chips, steak and ale pie, and roasts on Sundays.

2. Leyton Technical - A stylish pub that serves classic pub food, along with a selection of craft beers and cocktails.

3. Queen's Arms - A cozy pub that serves traditional British comfort food, including bangers and mash, fish and chips, and Sunday roasts.

4. The Grapevine Leytonstone - This restaurant serves modern British cuisine, with a focus on fresh, locally-sourced ingredients.

5. Forest Tandoori Grill - Though not strictly British cuisine, this restaurant serves a range of Indian dishes that have become a staple of British cuisine.

I hope these restaurant options are more helpful for you!
